title: Watch Face: Metallic Wallpaper
summary: An cool metallic animated watch face for your android wear smartwatch.
description: Customize your watch face with a mezmerizing metal animation that dances in the background. This animated wallpaper features HD graphics, smooth animations and variable metal speeds for a look that's sure to leave you pleased. This custom watchface operates in the background so users can keep the full-functionality of their smartwatch including date, time and push notifications.Stand out from the crowd with a custom watch design. descriptionHTML:
Customize your watch face with a mezmerizing metal animation that dances in the background. This animated wallpaper features HD graphics, smooth animations and variable metal speeds for a look that's sure to leave you pleased. This custom watchface operates in the background so users can keep the full-functionality of their smartwatch including date, time and push notifications.
Stand out from the crowd with a custom watch design. Download Metallic Watch Face today!

Works for most round & square smartwatches including:
Android Wear
Moto 360 ( moto360 )
Moto 360 2015 ( 42mm, 46mm )
Huawei Watch
LG G Watch R ( lgwr )
LG G Watch W100 ( lgwg )
LG Watch Urbane ( lgwu )
Sony Smartwatch 3 ( sw3 )
Samsung Gear Live
Asus ZenWatch ( zenwatch 1 & 2 )
Fossil Q
TAG Heuer Connected
Michael Kors Access
Nixon The Mission
Polar M600
and more!

Osthoro is delivering some of the best smartwatch wallpapers available today. Find other unique live wallpapers for your smartwatch by visiting www.osthoro.com today.
comments: Pop up ads Using this watch face without upgrading causes ads to pop up on your phone. The watch face isnt even good enough to warrant paying for it
